changelog.release_notes: Version 3.66: Significant weather improvements!
Version 3.65: Weather improvements.
Version 3.64: Weather improvements.
Version 3.63: Now available for Pebble 2 and Pebble Time 2!! Master Key (pmkey.xyz) support now included.
Version 3.62: Added option for manual weather location and other minor improvements.
Version 3.61: Weather improvements.
Version 3.60: Now available for Pebble 2!!

Version 3.50: NEW features added!
 - New-look configuration page
 - LIVE preview - options change directly on watch before pressing Save
 - Option to change date formats (UK & US style)
 - Option to vibrate when disconnected
 - Date displays the language chosen in user settings
 - Invert option now only shows in Classic Pebble and Pebble Steel
New version 3.0: Updated for Pebble Time Round!!  Also new-look configuration page and bug improvements.
Release version 2.0: Colours added!! Settings page now includes options to change background and foreground colours. Original Pebble users can still use the options to invert colours.

Release version 1.1: 

NEW configuration page to set the invert, display or hide seconds and choose C or F temperature units!

Moved AM/PM indicator and seconds to the left to center the time depending on the display options chosen.

data.description:
*** Also check out and install my new watchfaces, BEACON and Retro Digital! You'll love them as much as this one! ***
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 
Inspired by the Illuminator watchfaces created at Facerepo for the Motorola Moto 360 smartwatch, I have created the Pebble version. Displays full time (with seconds that can be hidden), date and watch battery level. The am/pm indicator disappears with the 24 hour format. Weather location, temperature and conditions are also displayed, and updates every 30 minutes, or when the watchface is loaded, whichever is sooner. The bluetooth icon serves as the connection indicator. It disappears when disconnected. Vibrations with each connection status.
Added: Colour options, new-look configuration page with LIVE preview (options change on watch before pressing Save), date format and vibration options added, invert, manual weather option and Master Key (pmkey.xyz) support.  Now updated for Pebble Time Round, Pebble 2 and Pebble Time 2.
Enjoy, and leave a heart!!
data.title: Moto 360 Illuminator Pro

data.author: Nev Rawlins

changelog.release_notes: Added support for Pebble firmware V4, Pebble 2 and Quick Views

data.description:
A digital watchface in 12-hour or 24-hour format, depending on the watch settings.

The idea for this watch was inspired by honeycomb, as the name suggests, with information displayed in the hexagonal cells. 

The time is shown in the 2 pairs of large cells – top two showing hours, bottom two minutes.

Additional cells show:
- Day, day of month and month in the top 3 cells
- Battery level in the large cell bottom left
- Bluetooth connection in the bottom right cell
- In 12-hour format, 1 small cell near the hours shows A (am) or P (pm)
- Remaining small cells  randomly show as empty or full

Configuration enables choice of three background colors:
 - Black 
 - Blue
 - Red

When Quick View appears, the day of the month is shown with the time.

The example screenshots show:  
(1) 7:28AM Saturday 26 October, 90% battery, 12-hour
(2) 12:34 Saturday 26 October, 60% battery, 24-hour, no bluetooth 
(3) 3:38PM Sunday 07 June, 20% battery, 12-hour
(4) 9:23PM Wednesday 10 June, 70% battery, 12-hour
(5) 19:44 (with Quick View) 

Design created by Peter Fletcher and taken from the Tokyoflash Design Studio.  This watchface is published with the designer's permission, and sanctioned by Tokyoflash.   

The original design can be found here: 
http://blog.tokyoflash.com/2012/02/14/honeycomb-lcd-watch-2-ways-to-tell-the-time/

latest_release.release_notes: Added support for Pebble firmware V4, Pebble 2 and Quick Views

data.title: Honeycomb

data.description: A watchface in celebration of the Hacking Conference held every year in Las Vegas, NV.   The images change randomly in response to a tap or shake. There is also a countdown timer to the next DEF CON.  The color palette also shifts with time. If you get an unreadable color combination, just try again.  Donate: 1JbxfRpG4iv3qscRe8wgFBXbNhmPesP723
data.title: DEFCON

data.author: Nev Rawlins
data.description:
Note that this watchface is no longer being updated/maintained as the inverted color is now a configurable option on the original Lunar watchface which also supports Pebble Time and Quick Views on Pebble 2.  Please use that watchface.


Design from the Tokyoflash Design Studio, created by Heather Sable Villano.   

Inverted version of Lunar.  A digital watchface in 12-hour format.  

It uses a rectangular four-quadrant format for the digits with circular pieces cut out to create recognizable yet abstract looking digits.  Top two digits are the hours, bottom two the minutes.

By placing the four digits into the quadrants without showing lines to separate them, the display appears to be simply an artistic looking pattern – maybe swiss cheese, or moon craters, hence the name.  

The screenshot examples show:  
 (1) 06:25
 (2) 12:57
 (3) 05:33
 (4) 11:11
 
This watchface is published with the designers’ permission, and sanctioned by Tokyoflash.   

The original design can be found here:  
http://blog.tokyoflash.com/2012/01/05/lunar-watch-perfect-for-citizens-of-moon-base-alpha/

To see other sanctioned Tokyoflash watchfaces, click on "More from this Developer".
data.title: Lunar: Dark Side

data.description:
A minimalist watchface displaying just the time with date available with a flick of the wrist.

(This face was inspired by FlexWatch but it differs several ways.)

• Simple time centred on the display.
• Manually kerned digits for optimal appearance.
• Improved, custom-drawn colon!
• No backlight adjustments.
• No vibrations.
• Icons are shown on the date slider if the battery is low or the bluetooth connection has been lost.
• Date displayed in ISO format.

latest_release.release_notes: Fixed bug whereby two digit hours (10, 11, 12) in 12-hour clock mode wouldn't render correctly.

Visually this release is a "zombie-tuning" to Update 2, I didn’t like the way the metronomes felt so connected.
Update 2 - Lights out!!  Power plants can't run with all of these miscellaneous undead out and about...
Over time the virus has started to devour zombie flesh, effectively consuming its host.
Initial release.  More to come as virus progresses.

data.description:
A simple eerie zombie watch face.  Watch the wound accumulate sutures and the zombie hand reverse every so often. 

This is a work in progress as the virus progresses...

Update 1 - Over time the virus has started to devour zombie flesh, effectively consuming its host.

Update 2 - Lights out!!(dark theme) Power plants are unable to run with all of these miscellaneous undead out and about...
Added date and radio active symbol ticker.

Update 3 - A pattern emerges as the cells transform.

latest_release.release_notes:
Update 3 - A pattern emerges as the cells transform. 

Visually this release is a "zombie-tuning" to Update 2, I didn’t like the way the metronomes felt so connected.

data.author: Chris Charles

changelog.release_notes:
English

Fix a bug that prevented settings from being saved.

Français

Réparer une erreur qui à empêché les options à être sauvé.

Español

Corregir un error que impedió las opciones de ser salvado.

Now with French and Spanish support!

English

* Add support for French on the watch and in the settings
* Add support for Spanish on the watch and in the settings
* Add option to start weeks on Sunday or on Monday
* Add option to remove Pebble branding from dial (mostly useful for Pebble Steel, which already carries branding on the bezel)

Français

* Nouveau support pour le français sur la montre et aussi dans les options
* Nouveau support pour l'espagnol sur la montre et aussi dans les options
* Nouvelle option pour commencer les semaines le dimanche ou le lundi
* Nouvelle option pour cacher la marque Pebble sur le cadran (premièrement pour Pebble Steel)

Español

* Nuevo opción para usar francés en el reloj y también en las opciones
* Nuevo opción para usar español en el reloj y también en las opciones
* Nuevo opción para comenzar la semana el domingo o el lunes
* Nuevo opción para ocultar la marca Pebble en la esfera (ante todo para Pebble Steel)

Initial release:

- Support for Aplite platform (Pebble and Pebble Steel)
- Date and day of week display
- Bluetooth indicator with optional vibrate on disconnect / reconnect
- Battery indicator (hidden until 40% or lower)
- Choice of dial markings (rectangular, elliptical, none)
- Choice of dial colour (black, white)
- Choice of second hand style (smart, always on, always off)

Smart second hand is shown for 10 seconds on tap events and never shown when battery is at 20% or lower.

data.description:
An elegant watchface for Pebble and Pebble Time, featuring configurable dial markings and colours, an optional smart second hand, and Bluetooth indicator with optional vibrate on disconnect / reconnect. In English, French and Spanish.

Colour version coming soon!

latest_release.release_notes:
English

Fix a bug that prevented settings from being saved.

Français

Réparer une erreur qui à empêché les options à être sauvé.

Español

Corregir un error que impedió las opciones de ser salvado.

data.description:
A digital watchface in 12 or 24-hour format, depending on the watch settings.  

It uses a rectangular four-quadrant format for the digits with circular pieces cut out to create recognizable yet abstract looking digits.  Top two digits are the hours, bottom two the minutes.

By placing the four digits into the quadrants without showing lines to separate them, the display appears to be simply an artistic looking pattern – maybe swiss cheese, or moon craters, hence the name.  

Configuration options to change foreground and background colors.


The screenshot examples show:  
 (1) 12:57
 (2) 06:24
 (3) 09:38
 (4) 11:11
 

This watchface originally appeared as a design on the Tokyoflash Design Studio and was created by Heather Sable Villano.   It is published with the designer's permission, and sanctioned by Tokyoflash.   

The original design can be found here:  
http://blog.tokyoflash.com/2012/01/05/lunar-watch-perfect-for-citizens-of-moon-base-alpha/

latest_release.release_notes: Added support for Pebble Time, Pebble Time Steel, Pebble 2, Pebble Time 2, color inversion on b&w Pebbles (so Lunar: Dark Side now obsolete), color choices for foreground and background on color Pebbles, and Quick Views.

changelog.release_notes: Added support for Pebble 2 and Quick Views
Adds color for Pebble Time and Pebble Time Steel

data.description:
The face of the watch has been halved and divided into four concentric half rings of markers. 
The first two (nearest the centre of the watch) show the hours. The smallest ring shows 0-6 and the larger 6-12. 
The outer two rings show the minutes, the smaller of the two shows 0-30 and the largest 30-60. 
The time is highlighted by rings around the relevant hour and minute.

Additional items:
- battery level on the left side of the face
- Bluetooth connection in the middle
- AM/PM on top / bottom of the right side.


Screenshots:  
(1) 3:15pm 100% battery, Bluetooth connection 
(2) 5:18am 90% battery, no Bluetooth connection
(3) 11:08pm 50% battery, Bluetooth connection
(4) 11:59pm 70% battery, Bluetooth (with Quick View)


Design from the Tokyoflash Design Studio, created by Peter Fletcher.   The watchface has been produced with the designers' permission, and sanctioned by Tokyoflash. 

The original design can be found here: 
http://blog.tokyoflash.com/2013/11/25/bilateral-shows-time-in-four-concentric-half-rings/

To see other watchfaces designed by Peter, including ones for Tokyoflash, along with others from the Tokyoflash Design Studio sanctioned by Tokyoflash, click on "More from this Developer".

data.description:
A digital watch display that includes hours, minutes, and seconds in the format hhmmss from top to bottom.  Each digit is made of seven segments, but they are all horizontal, which makes them flatten out a bit and allows for 6 digits to be displayed quite easily.


Screenshots show:  
 (1) 04:38:25
 (2) 09:46:17
 (3) 06:39:13
 (4) 06:48:56
 (5) 08:10 (with Quick View)
 
This design was created by Heather Sable Villano and originally appeared on the Tokyoflash Design Studio.   It is published with the designers’ permission, and sanctioned by Tokyoflash.   

The original design can be found here:  
http://blog.tokyoflash.com/2013/02/14/slim-latitute-watch-design-stretches-time/

Added support for Pebble 2 and Quick Views.
Added support for Pebble Time Round.  Requires Pebble firmware v3.8 or later.

data.description:
A digital watch with the digits stacked inside each other.

The time is read from the inside-out, so the 10-hours start in the middle, then the single hours, then 10-minutes and finally the single minutes on the outside.
The digits themselves are quite easy to distinguish.  You just need to note the differences between the 1 and the 7, and the rest should come naturally.
 
Displays in 12-hour or 24-hour format, depending on watch settings.
 
Screenshots show:  
 (1) 10:24
 (2) 09:03 (inverted)
 (3) 20:39 (24-hour format)
 (4) 23:58 (24-hour format, inverted)
 (5) 03:39 (Quick View)
 
Designed by Heather Sable Villano and originally appeared on the Tokyoflash Design Studio.   The watchface is published with the designers’ permission, and sanctioned by Tokyoflash.   

The original design can be found here:  
http://blog.tokyoflash.com/2012/05/07/inside-out-lcd-watch-stacks-up-time-digits/

data.description:
Watchface inspired by the Gate of Time that appears on the game The Legend of Zelda: Skyward Sword. The amount of details is limited due to resolution restrictions. 

- You can configure how often the gears rotate*.
- Hours and minutes are shown on the left and right gears respectively.
- Rupee counter indicates seconds or day of year*.
- Hearts indicate the amount of battery left.
- Navi is there to keep you company. She gets replaced by a small bolt while charging.
- Bluetooth status is indicated with the hookshot (since it hooks to your phone). It gets crossed when no BT connection is present.
- Temperature is shown on the lower right and updated when you open the watchface** as well as approximately every hour. You can toggle between Celsius and Fahrenheit within the Pebble app*.
- Weekday and Monthday are shown on top by default, you can shake your wrist to briefly look at Month and Year, although if you shake* too hard the gears might have to readjust themselves ;-)

If you set the gears' rotation to off or 1/minute AND the rupee counter to day of year, the screen will only be updated once every minute.

*Note that due to the way Pebble configuration works, you will need to have an internet connection active on your phone in order to access the watchface options.

** Weather updates are done on the minute mark, it may take a couple of minutes to load.

latest_release.release_notes:
- Added chalk support

- Artwork refinements

data.description:
Photon Date is a sleek, modern watchface. The numbers are inspired by the famed Eurostile typeface, but they have been optimized to render well on the Pebble display. 

A configuration window allows you to select white-on-black/black-on-white and day of the week/month/nothing. In 24-hour mode, the date is hidden from 20:00 to 23:59.

For a version without the date and a more faithful typeface, check out Photon.

data.description:
Vlaamse variant van de "Dutch Fuzzy Time".

De tijd wordt op een meer Vlaamse manier getoond in plaats van de Nederlandse manier.

Zo zijn er de volgende verschillen:
      - In plaats van "tien voor half drie" toont hij "twintig na twee"
      - In plaats van "tien over half drie" toont hij "twintig voor drie"
      - In plaats van "vijf over drie" toont hij "vijf na drie"

Verder laat hij ook de bluetooth status zien op een handige manier. 

Op het moment dat de bluetooth verbinding verbroken wordt zal hij 2x trillen en worden de kleuren "inverted" (witte achtergrond met zwarte letters). 

De kleuren zullen pas terug normaal worden op het moment dat de verbinding met je gsm terug in orde is.


ENGLISH VERSION:

Variation on the Dutch Fuzzy Time, uses more flemish way of showing time:
     - Instead of showing "tien over half drie" it will show "twintig voor drie".
     - Instead of "vijf over tien" it says "vijf na tien"

Also it notifies you when the bluetooth connection with your phone is lost by vibrating 2x and displaying the watchface with inverted colors (white bg, black letters) until the connection is restored again.
data.title: Flemish Fuzzy Time with Bluetooth status

data.description:
I made this for the Hungarian Pebblers originally in the spring of 2013. I updated the source for the new SDK and added some cool features, such as:
- TIME MODE change (Standard and Simple)
- INVERT MODE toggle
- 4 chosable background (Also with the well know KALOCSA pattern from my old wf)
- Presistent settings storage

All of the settings reachable through the Pebble App at the WF settings.

__________________________________

Korábban készítettem a Magyar Pebbler-eknek egy WF-t 2013 tavaszán, amit most felfrissítettem az új SDK-t használva. Számos új funkciót kapott az "óralap":
- Idő megjelenítési mód (sima és egyszerűsített)
- Színek kifordítása opció
- 4 választható háttér (A korábbi Kalocsai mintás is bekerült.)
- Beállítások meg maradnak a válások közt.

changelog.release_notes:
6.68 
-Bug fixed.
-Check out new watchface STRAIGHT PLUS with Health, Heart and more features.

6.67
-Minor improvement.
-Check out new watchface Straight Plus with health, heart and more.

v6.66
+ New theme dedicated to this version: 6.66 Number of the beast
+ New themes: Black-R-Orange, Black-R-Blue, Blue black hole, Owned by Dark red, Owned by Dark cyan
+ Polished themes: Owned by red, Owned by blue, Miami Vice (renamed from a previous theme)
+ New detail style: Wind speed only (without wind direction) and date
+ New weather icon theme: Magenta
+ Improved some icons aesthetics (size, color)
+ Changed: date styles with text (month, day of week) are now centered
+ New feature: Night theme (choose a theme to use on night schedule)
6.64 Fix issue with OpenWeather key.

6.63
+ Watch face app icon

6.62 
-bug fixed: displaying weather temperature below -19 in font style Medium.

v6.61
+ Pebble Time app v3.7.0.xxx for Android has a bug in communication system, and don't will be solved until app 3.8.xxx.
+ Improved and protection code to avoid communication pebble-phone bug.

v6.60
+ 3 New styles: Wind and Date, Humidity and Date, Location and Date
+ 3 New themes: PWN by Black -green / -orange / -magenta
+ Improvements
+ Pebble Time Round adjustment

v6.51
- Fix the watchface icon in Pebble watch
(read comment in v6.50 for the real last changes)

v6.50
+ Bug fixed: date style ignored (when using manual weather location)
+ New theme: Owned by Black-white
+ New icon styles: Yellow-Cyan-White, Variable colors
+ PEBBLE TIME ROUND supported

v6.40
+ New weather icons style: AUTOMATIC SELECTION (sets the most optimal for each theme)
+ Also AUTO SELECTION weather icons is useful for Random theme modes
+ Weather icons style simplified (2 styles removed, rearranged list)
+ Some weather icons improved
+ "Owned by Black" theme series improved
+ 3 new themes: Owned by Black-yellow, Owned by Black-cyan-yellow, Owned by Orange
+ Positions improved in some watch face styles.

v6.33
+ Some colors adjusted.

v6.32
- Bug fixed: battery bar color in the new setting "swap colors" for (PWN)-themes serie.

v6.31
- Bug fixed: battery bar color in the new setting "swap colors"

v6.30
+ New setting: Swap up/down theme colors! Double themes.
+ 2 new icons style
+ Bug fixed: date style ignored in some strange cases.

v6.20
- Workaround to load the accurate settings page when platform detection fails.
6.11 Fix watchface icon in 6.1

v6.1
+ (PEBBLE TIME)4 new weather icon styles: Default without stroke, and Cyan SE, Dark SE and Yellow SE, all them without stroke.
+ (PEBBLE ORIGINAL) 3 weather icon styles: Stroke only, Pattern fill, Full fill
+ Refinement of themes: Owned by Blue, Owned by Red, Owned by Purple (check it combining with the Yellow SE icons style)
+ 1 new theme: Owned by Black-cyan 
+ Internal improvements

6.0
NEW FEATURES:
+ New Weather icons style option (Default colors, Red special edition)
+ New Details style option (Maximal Temp and date)
+ New font option (Curved)
+ New Shake option (Do nothing, Change to next selected theme)
+ New themes (Owned by Cyan, Owned by Purple)

IMPROVES:
+ "Owned by" theme series get better
+ Themes have been rearranged and added theme serie prefix
+ Themes removed (Blue paint touch, Orange paint touch)
+ Show disconnected status in Hour and minutes separator
+ On reconnect double short vibration (if vibes on disconnect option enable)
+ Weather icons refined
+ Code optimization

BUG FIXED:
- Date format ignored in some cases

5.2
- Bug fixed in the last new feature about show battery bar only if charge below user setting.
- Retouch visual aspects in current "Owned by" theme series. 
- 4 new themes in the "Owned by" serie: Owned by Yellow, Owned by Black, Owned by White, Owned by Green
- Polish some weather icons.
- Adjust some colors in different themes.
- Improve memory usage.

data.description:
>>> Check out the new watchface "Straight Plus" with health, heart and more.

Follow the straight lines.

TL;DR version: 
"Press the settings button and enjoy of: 9 lookStyles x 4 fonts x 5 dateStyles x 2 batteryBar x 44 themes x 2 swapColors x 9 iconStyles = 285120 OMG different Straight skins!"

A straight path for: 
+ WEATHER TEMPERATURE UNIT (Celsius, Fahrenheit)
+ WIND SPEED UNIT (Km/h, mi/h)
+ DATE STYLE (Day.Month: 23.02, Month.Day: 02.23, Dayofweek Day: MON 23, Day only: 23, Monthofyear Day: FEB 23)
+ FONT STYLE (Thin, Middle, Thick, Curved)
+ WATCHFACE DETAILS STYLE (Original design, Minimalism lover, Weather fanatic, Minimalism but date, Maximal Temp and date, Wind and Date, Humidity and Date, Location and Date,..)
+ SHOW BATTERY CHARGE BAR (No, Yes, Only if below 50%, 40%...)
+ WATCHFACE THEME (43 color schemes, Color Weather, Random modes)
+ WEATHER ICONS STYLE (AUTO SELECTION, Default, multiple color theme)
+ TIME FORMAT (12, 24) (Detected from Pebble watch settings)
+ SHAKE FOR (Do nothing, Change to next selected theme)
+ VIBES ON DISCONNECT/RECONNECT (Yes, No)
+ WEATHER LOCATION (Blank for auto detection, ZipCode,CountryCode for manual location)

data.author: Nev Rawlins
data.description:
This watchface is no longer being updated/maintained as the original Kizamu watchface now takes the 12 or 24 mode from the watch settings.  Kizamu also now supports color Pebbles, Pebble 2, Quick Views and configuration option to change colors.  Please change over to using this watchface.

 

Design from the Tokyoflash Design Studio, created by Heather Sable Villano and Matthew Weiss.   

This version of Kizamu that displays in 12-hour mode.

A digital watch with the digits in the four quadrants, cut down the middle and positioned against the sides of the display, so you can still determine what the digit would be.  They are somewhat curved digits, to give a more abstract feel to the display.  

The top left and top right are the hours, and bottom left and bottom right are the minutes.

The screenshot examples show:  
 (1) 12:00
 (2) 11:44
 (3) 07:23
 (4) 09:56

This watchface is published with the designers’ permission, and sanctioned by Tokyoflash.   

The original design can be found here:  
http://blog.tokyoflash.com/2012/12/31/kizamu-led-watch-takes-the-edge-off/

To see other sanctioned Tokyoflash watchfaces, click on "More from this Developer".
data.title: Kizamu 12

-Watchface inverts when disconnected, returns to normal when reconnected
-6 God icon is back!

-Text size of background and of the time have been increased
-Location of the time has lowered
-6 god icon on the bottom has been removed to make space for the larger fonts
-Shorter and improved names for the watchface
-Improved menu image
Initial release

data.description:
**Featured in Pebble Time Kickstarter Update #17**

A watchface based on Drake's new album "If You're Reading This It's Too Late" (Yes, I know there's an apostrophe in "you're" and "it's". Look at the album artwork!) . Compatible with all Pebble watches.

This watchface includes a feature that will cause the watch to vibrate and the color of the watchface to invert (black with white text vs white with black text) to alert you when your Pebble has disconnected from your phone. This way, you never loose your phone!

Any comments, suggestions, or requests can be sent to me through the support link below. Don't forget to like!

latest_release.release_notes: 3.0 is finally here! This release includes Pebble Round compatibility.

data.author: dP-watchfaces

changelog.release_notes: 3.7 settings page host changed

3.6
- Minor improvements

3.5
- Weather data cache
3.2 fix bug in weather refresh
3.1 Improvements and aesthetics. Multiple themes.

3.0 
- Lot of improvements
- Ready for SDK 3 (colors in Pebble Time / Time Steel)

2.5
- User settings added:
+ Temperature units (ºC, ºF, ºK)
+ Day/Month order (first day or first month)
+ Inverted colors (original or inverted)
- Lot of improvements
1.1 Fix when clean weather info
1.0 Initial car

data.description:
Pebble's car, a vehicle of smart time.

- Co-driver: Hours (12h or 24h)
- Driver: Minutes
- Left lamp: Day (or Month) (configurable)
- Right lamp: Month (or Day)  (configurable)
- Hood brand logo: Percentage of battery charge
- License plate: Your current weather location (or Pebble if not available yet)
- Landscape (left): Weather condition
- Oil indicator (right): Weather temperature (Celsius, Fahrenheit or Kelvin) (configurable)
- On bluetooth disconnet: Shows a car's key indicator
- On battery is charging: Shows a battery indicator
- When battery is low (20%): Shows a fuel hose, battery refill is needed.
- Vibes on disconnect optional
- Sky changes on day or night (color Pebble only)
data.title: Vehicular time

data.author: Dan Tasse

changelog.release_notes: First release!

data.description:
Shows two-letter words, one per minute, so you can learn them for playing word games. Contains all 105 two-letter words that are legal in the Official Scrabble Dictionary, OSPD5. (For two-letter words, this is the same list as TWL.)

Also shows the time and date, because that's convenient.
data.title: Scrabble Two Letters

data.author: TeamWatchFace
data.description:
Time in two variants 12 and 24 hrs format,no need to do any changes to the setting to change 12 to 24 hrs format.Just flick your wrist it will automatically change the date format and it will show AM or PM for 12hrs format.
I'm so lazy to change the configurations for 12 and 24 hrs format,now this watch face made easy to change date format at your wrist.
Inspired by many watch faces and designed this.Hope you like this watch face .
data.title: TIME

data.author: Andrew Hutchings

changelog.release_notes: Minor weather sync fixes

* Fixed several issues with weather syncing
* Only update the seconds every second, rest of time every minute, date every day, etc...
* Remove tap to update (kept triggering when user was active)
* Update every 15 minutes (TODO: make this configurable)
* Add last updated time
* Fixed some crashing bugs

* Converted icons to font icons
* Fixed more formatting issues
* Fixed several sync issues

* Changed font to a fixed width one
* Fixed alignment issues
Fix config page link
Initial release

data.description:
Originally a fork of Markas_K's GeekyTime which in addition shows seconds and ISO 8601 formatted date.  Now taken on a life of its own.

Features:

* 12/24 hour time
* Weather conditions and temperature (in C or F)
* Battery life
* Vibrate on phone connect / disconnect
* Weather refresh every 15 minutes (with last update time)
data.title: Geeky ISO Time

code cleanup, better stability

The initial release.

Used to be know as Android Weather F or Android Weather C. Have merged the two together since there is now a settings page.

data.author: Akwaryoum

changelog.release_notes: Fixed some minor font display errors
Added a configuration window, you can now enable or disable the bluetooth and battery info or the type of notification made on Bluetooth disconnection. (Thanks to Michel. P for the suggestion)
Fix crash on Pebble Time
Fixed some display issues with the date

- Minor improvements on battery life
- Reduced app size
- Getting ready for Pebble Time support
Added a bluetooth icon

First release:
- time
- date
- year
- battery percentage

data.description:
English
A simple configurable watchface who displays: time, date, year bluetooth connection and battery percentage. Last two can be switched off, and a notification can be made in case of Bluetooth disconnection.
It should be pretty battery-efficient and it's localized in: EN, FR, DE, ES.
Compatible with Time and Classic Pebble watches.

Français
Une watchface très simple et personalisable qui affiche: l'heure, la date, l'année, le statut de la connexion Bluetooth et la charge de la batterie. Les deux derniers sont désactivable, et une notification peut être faite en cas de déconnexion Bluetooth.
Elle devrait être assez économe en batterie et est traduite en EN, FR, DE, ES.
Les montres Pebble Time et Classic sont supportées.

Enjoy ! :)

data.description:
Yeah! Clock for Pebble is a nice, simple and customisable Watchface.

Custom Options:
- show / hide the Date and Weather Informations
- invert the Colors
- more options planned

I've decided to port my Android Wear Watchface to the Pebble, because PEBBLE ROCKS!!!
data.title: Yeah! Clock for Pebble
